input.sentences: everyone had a great time at my party last night .
they all showed up and we started chatting .
we played a lot of party games .
afterward some people were sleepy and took a nap on my couch .
output.sentences: I invited my friends to the party.
The guy started chatting with the pretty girl.
They played a lot of games at the party.
Some of my friends became sleepy and took a nap on the couch.
